issue.title: [Format/Java/C++] Ensuring encapsulated stream / IPC message sizes are always a multiple of 8
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1343](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1343). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While record batch messages will be a multiple of 8 by construction, schema messages may not be.
